Issue.creator: burdettadam
Issue.summary: NodeJS Wrapper: Issue while installking indy-sdk on WINDOWS
Issue.description:
Hi,I am facing Linking error while installing indy-sdk on windows system using following url:https://www.npmjs.com/package/indy-sdkI have installed following pre-requisites:1. C++ Build tools2. Python 2.7Following is the error when i try to install the sdk:```> node-gyp rebuildC:\Users\h
ode_modules\indy-sdk>if not defined npm_config_node_gyp (node "C:\Users\h\AppData\Roaming
